definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: She stretched her arms towards the glowing Moon.
sentences.chinese: 她向着皎皎的月亮舒展双臂。

sentences.english: She stretched her arms towards the glowing Moon.
sentences.chinese: 她向着皎皎的月亮舒展双臂。

sentences.english: Have you ever heard the wolf cry to The blue cry moon?
sentences.chinese: 独狼引颈皎月的长嚎，你可曾听过？

sentences.english: Moon, pour China, long life, thousands of miles of the moon were.
sentences.chinese: 皎皎明月，倾泻神州，但愿人长久，千里共婵娟。

sentences.english: Moon, pour China, long life, thousands of miles of the moon were.
sentences.chinese: 皎皎明月，倾泻神州，但愿人长久，千里共婵娟。

sentences.english: The wordless bright moon in the night sky is lonesome too.
sentences.chinese: 夜空中沉默的那轮皎月也是寂寞的。

sentences.english: Me and my "sister" Cherry met and had dinner on Sunday night.
sentences.chinese: 周日晚和亲如妹妹的小皎同学见了面。

sentences.english: Whiles all the night, through fog-smoke white.

definition: a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
bare and bald (of mountains)/bright and brilliant/fat and sleek

capital of the Jin State during the Spring and Autumn Period (770-475 BC)
(archaic) to give birth to a child/to rear
a knot of hair on top of head
jade disk with a hole in the center
limpid autumn waters (trad. description of girl's beautiful eyes)
